statements: SELECT * FROM power_plants;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM power_plants;
SELECT plant_name, capacity FROM power_plants WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM power_plants WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT plant_name, capacity, status FROM power_plants ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM power_plants WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY plant_name DESC, location ASC
SELECT plant_name, location FROM power_plants WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT plant_id, location, status FROM power_plants ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM power_plants WHERE capacity BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT plant_name, capacity FROM power_plants WHERE location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY capacity ASC
SELECT * FROM hydroelectric_power_plants;
SELECT plant_name, capacity FROM hydroelectric_power_plants WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT id, plant_name, location, capacity FROM hydroelectric_power_plants ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT plant_name, location, capacity FROM hydroelectric_power_plants WHERE capacity > 5000;
SELECT * FROM electricity_generation WHERE generation_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT plant_name, location FROM hydroelectric_power_plants;
SELECT id, plant_name, capacity FROM hydroelectric_power_plants ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM electricity_generation WHERE generation_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT plant_name, location, capacity, power_output FROM hydroelectric_power_plants JOIN electricity_generation ON hydroelectric_power_plants.id = electricity_generation.plant_id;
SELECT plant_name, power_output FROM hydroelectric_power_plants INNER JOIN electricity_generation ON hydroelectric_power_plants.id = electricity_generation.plant_id WHERE power_output > 1000;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, location, capacity FROM HydroelectricPowerPlants;
SELECT * FROM ElectricityGeneration ORDER BY generation_time DESC;
SELECT plant_name, location, capacity FROM HydroelectricPowerPlants WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name FROM HydroelectricPowerPlants WHERE location LIKE 'A%';
SELECT SUM(consumed_power) AS total_power_consumed FROM PowerConsumption;
SELECT plant_name, location, capacity FROM HydroelectricPowerPlants;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, location, capacity FROM HydroelectricPowerPlants ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT plant_name, location, generated_power FROM HydroelectricPowerPlants JOIN ElectricityGeneration ON HydroelectricPowerPlants.plant_id = ElectricityGeneration.plant_id;

SELECT plant_name, generated_power, consumed_power FROM HydroelectricPowerPlants JOIN ElectricityGeneration ON HydroelectricPowerPlants.plant_id = ElectricityGeneration.plant_id JOIN PowerConsumption ON ElectricityGeneration.generation_time = PowerConsumption.timestamp;

SELECT plant_name, location, generated_power, consumed_power FROM HydroelectricPowerPlants JOIN ElectricityGeneration ON HydroelectricPowerPlants.plant_id = ElectricityGeneration.plant_id JOIN PowerConsumption ON ElectricityGeneration.generation_time = PowerConsumption.timestamp WHERE consumed_power > 5000;
SELECT * FROM PowerPlants;
SELECT plant_name, location, capacity FROM PowerPlants WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM Employees WHERE employee_role = 'Engineer';
SELECT log_id, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceLogs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT power_plant_id, MAX(total_production) AS max_production FROM ElectricityProduction GROUP BY power_plant_id;
SELECT * FROM PowerPlants ORDER BY plant_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT plant_name, capacity FROM PowerPlants WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY capacity ASC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role, employee_department FROM Employees WHERE employee_role = 'Engineer';

SELECT p.plant_name, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_details FROM PowerPlants p JOIN MaintenanceLogs m ON p.power_plant_id = m.power_plant_id WHERE m.maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT e.employee_name, ep.production_date, ep.total_production FROM Employees e JOIN ElectricityProduction ep ON e.employee_id = ep.power_plant_id WHERE e.employee_department = 'Operations' ORDER BY ep.production_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM HydroelectricPowerPlants;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM HydroelectricPowerPlants WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM ElectricityProduction ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(consumption_amount) AS total_consumption FROM PowerConsumption WHERE consumption_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';

SELECT plant_name, COUNT(maintenance_id) AS maintenance_count FROM HydroelectricPowerPlants JOIN PowerPlantMaintenance ON HydroelectricPowerPlants.plant_id = PowerPlantMaintenance.plant_id GROUP BY plant_name HAVING maintenance_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM HydroelectricPowerPlants;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM HydroelectricPowerPlants WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT pp.plant_name, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_type FROM HydroelectricPowerPlants pp JOIN PowerPlantMaintenance m ON pp.plant_id = m.plant_id WHERE m.maintenance_type = 'preventive';

SELECT p.production_date, p.production_amount, pp.plant_name FROM ElectricityProduction p JOIN HydroelectricPowerPlants pp ON p.plant_id = pp.plant_id WHERE p.production_amount > 5000 ORDER BY p.production_date DESC;
SELECT w.location, AVG(w.temperature) AS avg_temperature, AVG(w.humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM WeatherData w GROUP BY w.location HAVING AVG(w.temperature) > 20;
